info.title: API#1685 Individual Income
info.description: This API retrieves the Self Assessment or PAYE income details of the person identified by NINO across a range of tax years

servers.description: Different hostnames and ports are used in different IF environments

hostname.description: The hostname for one of IST, Clone, and Production

port.description: The port for one of IST, Clone, and Production

get.description:
Retrieve a person's Self Assessment income details using a date range or PAYE income details using a tax year range using a NINO as the person's identifier. Optionally specify a subset of data items to return using the 'fields' query string parameter.

/individuals/income/{incomeType}/{idType}/{idValue}?[startYear={year}&endYear={year}&startDate={date}&endDate={date}&fields={data items spec}]

Example URIs:
  
  For SA:\\n/individuals/income/sa/nino/AB123456C?startYear=2013&endYear=2019
  
  For PAYE with data filtering: /individuals/income/paye/nino/AB123456C?startDate=2015-04-06&endDate=2019-04-05&fields=paye(taxYear,employee(hasPartner),payroll(id),payFrequency)
  
```
Change Log:
Version Date       Author         Description
0.1.0   16-09-2020 Wayne Morris   Initial draft for review
0.2.0   09-10-2020 Wayne Morris   As a result of an updated backend spec and specific requirement on partner details:
                                  1) Added 3 new response properties \"turnover\", \"otherBusIncome\", and \"tradingIncomeAllowance\" to the Self Assessment data
                                  2) Added a new boolean property \"hasPartner\" to the PAYE data
                                  3) Added \"minProperties\" set to 1 to the \"partner\" object
                                  4) Updated relevant example responses; removed \"partner\" from example filtered PAYE response
                                  5) Refined the regex pattern for the 'fields' query string
1.0.0   13-10-2020 Wayne Morris   Baselined version. Changes since 0.2.0:
                                  1) Updated the regex pattern for the 'fields' query string parameter
                                  2) Updated the example URI for PAYE data with filtering
```

SA Full Response.summary: Self Assessment income details with maximum data

SA Filtered Response.summary: Self Assessment income details with filtered data

PAYE Full Response.summary: PAYE income details with maximum data

PAYE Filtered Response.summary: PAYE income details with filtered data

400.description:
Bad Request
```
A bad request has been made; this could be due to one or more issues with the request
"code"                 "reason"
INVALID_INCOMETYPE      Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter incomeType.
INVALID_IDTYPE          Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter idType.
INVALID_IDVALUE         Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter idValue.
INVALID_CORRELATIONID   Submission has not passed validation. Invalid header CorrelationId.
INVALID_STARTDATE       Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter startDate.
INVALID_ENDDATE         Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter endDate.
INVALID_STARTYEAR       Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter startYear.
INVALID_ENDYEAR         Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter endYear.
INVALID_FIELDS          Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter fields.

failures.reason: Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter idType.
Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter idType.
Submission has not passed validation. Invalid parameter idValue.
Submission has not passed validation. Invalid header CorrelationId.

404.description:
Not Found
```
"code"                        "reason"
NO_DATA_FOUND                 The remote endpoint has indicated that there was no data available.

failures.reason: The remote endpoint has indicated that there was no data available.

422.description:
Unprocessable Entity
```
"code"                   "reason"
UNKNOWN_DATA_ITEM        The requested data item {requested data item name} is not known.

failures.reason: The requested data item contactdetials is not known.
The requested data item sa(retrunList) is not known.
The requested data item sa(returnList(address(lien1))) is not known.

428.description:
Precondition Required
```
NOTE: INVALID_IDENTIFIERS included for future use when the endpoint supports multiple types of identifiers

"code"                  "reason"
INVALID_INCOME_RANGE    Submission has not passed validation. The incomeType and date/year range parameters are not a valid combination.
INVALID_IDENTIFIERS     Submission has not passed validation. The idType and idValue path parameters are not a valid combination.

failures.reason: Submission has not passed validation. The incomeType and date/year range parameters are not a valid combination.
Submission has not passed validation. The idType and idValue path parameters are not a valid combination.
Submission has not passed validation. The incomeType and date/year range parameters are not a valid combination.

Server Error
```

failures.reason: IF is currently experiencing problems that require live service intervention.
```

failures.reason: Dependent systems are currently not responding.

CorrelationId.description: CorrelationID - Used for traceability purposes when present. UUID format

correlationId.name: CorrelationId
correlationId.description: Mandatory. A UUID format string for the transaction. If not specified the IF will create a UUID value to be used

incomeTypeParam.name: incomeType
incomeTypeParam.description: Mandatory. Identification type. Possible values are 'sa' or 'paye' only

idTypeParam.name: idType
idTypeParam.description: Mandatory. Identification type. Possible values are 'nino' only

idValueParam.name: idValue
idValueParam.description: Mandatory. Currently only a NINO with optional suffix is supported

startDateQueryParam.name: startDate
startDateQueryParam.description:
Optional query string parameter to specify a start date in YYYY-MM-DD format for the range of data required.
Mandatory when the {incomeType} path parameter is 'paye'

endDateQueryParam.name: endDate
endDateQueryParam.description:
Optional query string parameter to specify an end date in YYYY-MM-DD format for the range of data required.
Mandatory when the {incomeType} path parameter is 'paye'

startYearQueryParam.name: startYear
startYearQueryParam.description:
Optional query string parameter to specify a start tax year in YYYY format for the range of data required.
Mandatory when the {incomeType} path parameter is 'sa'

endYearQueryParam.name: endYear
endYearQueryParam.description:
Optional query string parameter to specify an end tax year in YYYY format for the range of data required.
Mandatory when the {incomeType} path parameter is 'sa'

fieldsQueryParam.name: fields
fieldsQueryParam.description:
Optional query string parameter to specify a subset of data to be returned.
A comma-separated list of response property names. Where the response property is an object or array then each required property within that object/array must be specified by inclusion as a comma-separated list within round brackets immediately after the object/array property name e.g.

fields=sa(taxYear,income,returnList(caseStartDate,businessDescription,address(line1,line2,line3,line4,postcode)))

errorResponse.title: API#1685 Get Individual Income Error Response Schema 1.0.0

code.description: Keys for all the errors returned

reason.description: A simple description for the failure

successResponse.title: API#1685 Get Individual Income Success Response Schema 1.0.0

sa.description: Mandatory. An array of entries for up to 7 consecutive tax years.

paye.description: Mandatory. An array of entries across the requested date range.

allOf.description: The tax year that the returnList relates to
Sum of all of the 'income.selfAssessment' fields in this taxyear's 'returnList' array entries

returnList.description: The list of CESA returns for this tax year

allOf.description: The date on which the taxpayer is set up by either automated input, such as via a Return, or by an operator online
The start date of Self Employment
Any additions made in later years
The total income from the self-assessment
The income earned as a partner of a trust
Total from all employments
Profit from self-employment as a sole trader
Profit from partnerships
Total profit from UK property for a year. If the profit figure is negative this field will contain zero.
Total amount of foreign income, derived from 4 separate sources
Total amount from foreign dividends
Total amount of UK interest received before Tax
Total of interest and dividends received, derived from 12 separate sources from UK companies and trusts
Total income from pensions, derived from 12 separate sources
Total income from sources that are not included anywhere else on the return
Total gains on life policies
Total amount from share options
Total income on which tax is due
The tax credits on foreign dividends
The total capital gains due
The total capital gains tax due
The total income tax and capital gains and nic4 contributions
The total tax and nic4 contributions due
Income tax relief reduced to maximum allowable
Payments into a retirement annuity contract etc
Gift of investments and property to charity
Gross annuity payments
Foreign tax on estates (tax credit relief not claimed)
Pension Payments Relief
Gift aid payments made in this tax year (multiplied by 1.25)
Total Business Expenses
Total Disallowable Business Expenses

businessDescription.description: The description of the business as supplied by the individual

telephoneNumber.description: The description of the business as supplied by the individual

allOf.description: The effective date of the base address

addressTypeIndicator.description: The type of address in the 'address' object. B = Taxpayer Base, C = Correspondence

employerPayeRef.description: The unique identifier for the Scheme making this payment

accountingOfficeReference.description: The accounts office reference of the scheme

individualIdentifier.description: A Temporary Reference Number (TRN) or NINO (without suffix). Reflects the identifier that was used in the request.

currentNino.description: The National Insurance Number (without suffix) as provided by the backend

trn.description: The Temporary Reference Number as provided by the backend

allOf.description: The payroll/works number of the employee as submitted by the employer

bacs.description: A collection of properties related to BACS transactions

confirmationCode.description: The BACS confirmation code for payment; either '2' or '3'

payment.description: The amount on the associated BACS payment

ipsCount.description: The number of IPS reconciled to the BACS payment

paymentId.description: The payment hash code supplied by the employer with the intention of it being matched by an equivalent record from BACS

taxYear.description: The tax year of submission, format YY-YY.

receivedAt.description: A collection of properties related to when the submission was received within HMRC

govGateway.description: The date and time that the submission was received at the government gateway; format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

backend.description: The date and time that the submission was received at the backend; format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

available.description: The date and time that the submission was available at the backend; format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

submissionClass.description: Full Payment Submission (FPS) or Employer Alignment Submission (EAS)

employee.description: A collection of properties related to the employee in the submission

allOf.description: The NINO supplied in the submission; includes suffix if this was provided
Date of Birth of the person for whom the Payment Data has been received

gender.description: The gender of the person receiving the payment

passportNumber.description: The passport number of the employee

allOf.description: The title of the employee
The name of the employee

hasPartner.description: Optional. Will only be true if the partner object is present

partner.description: Optional. A collection of properties concerning the employee's partner

allOf.description: The NINO of the employee's social partner
The name of the employee's social partner
The date the employee commenced this employment
The date the employee's employment ended

duplicate.description: Whether this FPS has been received before (byte for byte) (true) or not (false)

occPensionBereaved.description: Indicator that Occupational Pension is being paid (true) because they are a recently bereaved Spouse/Civil Partner

statePensionBereaved.description: Indicator that State Pension is being paid (true) because they are a recently bereaved Spouse/Civil Partner

eeaCitizen.description: Indicator of whether a European Economic Area citizen; true - the employee is, false - the employee is not

epm6Scheme.description: Indicator that this is an EPM 6 (modified) scheme; true - it is, false - it is not

occupationalPension.description: Indicator that Occupational Pension is being paid (true)

irregularPayment.description: Indicator that the employee does not receive regular payments (true)

expatriate.description: Indicator that the employee is an expatriate (true)

paymentAfterLeaving.description: Indicator that the payment is a payment after date of notification of contract ending (true)

nonCumulativeTaxCode.description: Indicator that the tax code basis is non-cumulative (true)

onStrike.description: Indicator of whether the employee has been on strike (true)

unpaidAbsence.description: Indicator of whether the employee has had unpaid absence (true)

flexiblyAccessPensionRights.description: Indicator of whether the employee is flexibly accessing pension rights (true)

pensionDeathBenefit.description: Indicator of whether the employee is receiving pension death benefit (true)

seriousIllHealthLumpSum.description: Indicator of whether the employee has received a Serious Ill Health lump sum (true)

studentLoan.description: Indicator of whether the employee has student loan reductions (true)

postGradLoan.description: Indicator of whether the employee has post grad student loan reductions (true)

offPayrollWorker.description: Indicator of whether the individual is an off-payroll worker subject to 2020 rules (true)

payroll.description: Properties relevant to the employee's payroll

allOf.description: Identifier assigned by the employer to the individual

idChanged.description: Indicator of whether the payroll id has been changed (true)

allOf.description: Previous identifier assigned by the employer to the individual

directorsNicCalcMethod.description: Method of calculating the director’s NIC, either Annual or Alternative

taxWkOfApptOfDirector.description: Tax Week/Month number of the Appointment of Director. Range 1 - 54, and 56

payFrequency.description: The frequency of payments. W1 Weekly, W2 Fortnightly, W4 Four weekly, M1 Monthly, M3 Quarterly, M6 Bi-annually, MA Annually, IO One off, IR Irregular

lateReason.description:
The reason that the payment was submitted late as supplied by the employer
A: Notional payment: Payment to Expat by third party or overseas employer
B: Notional payment: Employment related security
C: Notional payment: Other
D: Payment subject to Class 1 NICs but P11D/P9D for tax
E: Micro Employer using temporary "on or before" relaxation
F: No requirement to maintain a Deductions Working Sheet or Impractical to report work done on the day
G: Reasonable excuse
H: Correction to earlier submission

weeklyPeriodNumber.description: If paid weekly, the period number. Range 1 - 54, and 56

monthlyPeriodNumber.description: If paid monthly, the period number. Range 1 - 12

allOf.description: The date the payment was made

earningsPeriodsCovered.description: The number of periods covered by the payment dependent on the type of payment frequency

allOf.description: Number of normal hours worked

taxCode.description: Tax code associated with the payment

allOf.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind to date
Total tax to date in this employment
Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind

taxDeductedOrRefunded.description: Value of tax deducted or refunded from this payment

benefits.description: A set of properties relevant to benefit payments

allOf.description: Value of benefits subject to Class1 NICs
Value of benefits not subject to Class1 NICs
Value of benefits taxed via the payroll to date
Value of benefits taxed via the payroll in pay period

employeePensionContribs.description: A set of properties relevant to employee pension contributions

allOf.description: Value of employee pension contributions to date
Value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement
Value of employee pension contributions paid under net pay arrangements in pay period
Value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement
Value of payments not subject to tax or NICs in pay period
Value of deductions from net pay in pay period
Pay After Statutory Deductions
Items subject to Class 1 NIC but not taxed under PAYE regulations excluding pension contributions in pay period
Class 1A NICs year to date

Value of Statutory Paternity Pay year to date
Value of Statutory Adoption Pay year to date
Value of Statutory Shared Parental Pay year to date
Value of Statutory Parental Bereavement Pay year to date
Annual amount of Occupational Pension
Annual amount of State Pension
Flexible drawdown non-taxable payment
Flexible drawdown taxable payment

trivialCommutation.description: A set of properties relevant to trivial commutation

typeA.description: Type A: Trivial commutation lump sums

allOf.description: The value of the trivial commutation lump sum

typeB.description: Type B: Small pot lump sums from personal pensions

typeC.description: Type B: Small pot lump sums from occupational pensions

allOf.description: The value of the occupational pension lump sum

niLetter.description: A set of properties relevant to National Insurance Category letter

grossEarningsForNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to gross earnings for National Insurance Contributions

earnings.description: A set of properties relevant to employee earnings for the year to date

lower.description: A set of properties relevant to employee earnings at or below the Lower Earnings Limit for the year to date

primary.description: A set of properties relevant to employee earnings above the Lower Earnings Limit to the Primary Threshold for the year to date

upper.description: A set of properties relevant to employee earnings from the Primary Threshold up to and including the Upper Earnings Limit for the year to date

totalEmployerNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to the totals of employer National Insurance Contributions

employeeNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to the employee's National Insurance Contributions due on all earnings

paySubjectToNIC.description: A set of properties relevant to the pay subject to National Insurance Contributions

allOf.description: Disguised Remuneration Income

studentLoan.description: A set of properties relevant to the employee's student loan

allOf.description: Repayments in this pay period
Total Student Loans repayments recovered in year to date in this employment

postGradLoan.description: A set of properties relevant to the employee's post graduate student loan

allOf.description: Repayments in this pay period
Total Student Loans repayments recovered in year to date in this employment

postCode.description: Max 10 characters, cannot start with a space

country.description: The foreign country of the employee.

nameObjectType.description: A collection of properties related to an individual's name

initials.description: The initials of the person receiving the payment
